interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: ALICROWN 3D False Eyelashes 4 Styles Volume Soft Lashes Hand-made Reusable Long Lash
Review Date: 2019/10/11
Store: ALICROWN HAIR
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'ALICROWN HAIR', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.94 x 3.94 x 0.59 inches', 'Material Feature': 'Lash', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Product Dimensions': '3.94 x 3.94 x 0.59 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '734830078440'}
Review Text: When I received the lashes (which was in two days from purchase date), I immediately was fond of the packaging. The package was cute and then I opened the boxes the lashes came in. There were multiple styles! All were so pretty and unique. I recommend these lashes for the quality and price. I will recommend these to my friends!
Review Title: Great
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preferences**: Demonstrates a strong interest in beauty products, particularly false eyelashes. Values variety in styles and high-quality offerings.
- **Quality Sensitivity**: Prioritizes quality and craftsmanship in products, as indicated by the emphasis on hand-made and reusable features.
- **Value for Money**: Appreciates affordable options without compromising on quality, suggesting a focus on cost-effectiveness when making purchases.
- **Aesthetics**: Shows a preference for appealing packaging and presentation, indicating an appreciation for visual appeal in product design.
- **Social Influence**: Willing to recommend products to friends, suggesting a tendency towards sharing positive experiences, indicative of social engagement and influence.
- **Positive Feedback**: Provides high ratings for satisfactory products, suggesting a tendency to express positivity when experiences meet or exceed expectations.

Overall, the user appears to be a beauty enthusiast who values quality, variety, and aesthetic appeal in products while maintaining a focus on affordability.
